description_text:
I have connected these and the  brake and gas and clutch does not go to
100% the brakes do, I know that's not your problem now but not kool, this
is very very very very very stressful very very very stressful.  Maybe I
should have left them were that were with them were I got them from being
that they were out open,  not cool. But I will maintain my composure,  but
let me say thank you.  I will not bother yall again. The last set   great.

conversations.body_text: Hi terry smith,    We apologize for the inconvenience. We are currently on an 8-day holiday break. We will ship your order immediately from our US warehouse and send you a 3-pedal set as compensation. Thank you for your understanding.

Hi terry smith,    I apologize for not getting back to you sooner; we've just wrapped up our 8-day holiday. I see your order has been shipped and should arrive within the next couple of days. https://www.fedex.com/wtrk/track/?trknbr=884957355301

I no longer needed them , that's why I paid for the fast shipping so they
would arrive at the time I needed them, i placed order on the 30 it's know
the ninth,  will decline at post office as there isn't another way to send
back. Thanks will contact shop to let them know what's going on with these
order, also. Thanks again.

On Thu, Oct 9, 2025, 2:48 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi terry smith,     Your parcel has encountered an issue, likely due to an error in your address details. You may contact FedEx to provide the correct information.  Should you require a return, please send the item back to us after receiving it. Thank you for your understanding. https://www.fedex.com/fedextrack/?trknbr=884957355301&trkqual=12029~884957355301~FDEG
Hi terry smith,  I note that the parcel has been delivered. May I ask whether you have received it? https://www.fedex.com/fedextrack/?trknbr=884957355301&trkqual=12029~884957355301~FDEG

合并来自工单4433  
      主题: Refund  
      描述:  Not nice, but expected iam no different should have read reviews before ordering. Please with all do respect i would like a refund. I truly enjoyed the first set I ordered off of Amazon the plus set. Thought these set the ultimate would be a lot better,  guess i will never know. Five days have not even a tracking number, the listing says ship's in three days, I given 5. Thank you for the first ones, I really got use out of them. But I would love a refund for this oder, have a good day,  and thank you again.

      描述:
Hi terry smith,    Please don't worry; we are contacting the logistics provider to investigate.

I would like a refund please. I do not have and i have not received my
orde.  Just a refund would be fine. Thank you.

On Mon, Oct 20, 2025, 5:45 AM service@simsonn.com

21 days shipping,  when i paid for fast shipping, I no longer need them
just a refund .

This was not 24h, two days ago, still thank you for reaching out.

On Sat, Oct 18, 2025, 5:21 PM service@simsonn.com

(P.O. Box 192 doyline LA 71023.    )          That makes no sense that i
would  be there to sign  for it. That's not cool, I checked there and
nothing was there,   post office worker says there wasn't anything but what
was in my box that came for me.

Hi terry smith,    We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused. This is the proof of delivery provided by FedEx. We are aware that you have not received your parcel and will arrange for an investigation. We will dispatch a replacement as soon as possible, so please rest assured.
Hi terry smith,     Please verify the address on this proof of delivery.

That's not are never has been my address,  that was my father's old address
before he passed in 2019, Terry l Smith Sn, my address is again P.O box 192
Doyline LA 71023. I have not been around that address in Haughton
Louisiana, in a long time, I have no idea who stays there. Again my address
the address that I used is P.O Box 192 I myself have never used that
address for anything. Take a look at my [driver's license] iam a Jr. My dad
doesn't live there , he is gone on to heaven. Sorry for putting it that
way. But if it was delivered there, I will never go get it i didn't order
it there,  that wasn't my fault,  but who ever delivered it there i would
appreciate it if they would go and receive it back  and return it to you
all. I am a veteran with PTSD simracing has been helping me very much so.
And this situation has been very stressful, simracing is we're i release
that stress, it has been a minute since i have raced  because the first set
i ordered from Amazon , of you all brake sets i really enjoyed. now waiting
on an order that I paid for express shipping,  to get back to my


hobby. Please send who ever placed them at the wrong address to go back and
get them. Thanks a lot for you service.

On Wed, Oct 22, 2025, 1:01 AM service@simsonn.com

Ps that address where they delivered it is not in Doyline,  that is
Haughton.

Hi terry smith,     Please provide your full street address. Incomplete address details have resulted in a failed delivery. We will issue a refund for you, so please do not worry. Now, kindly assist us in completing the parcel retrieval process.

This is my physical address.

On Wed, Oct 22, 2025, 3:43 AM service@simsonn.com

I live in a trailer park.  That address to P.O Box is 1167 high way 163 p.o
Box 192

Hi terry smith, We shall first submit a claim for reimbursement, though it is highly unlikely to succeed as the address you provided was indeed incomplete. We shall refund you once the outcome is confirmed. Should the claim fail, you will bear partial responsibility, amounting to approximately $90. Thank you for your understanding.

I kinda understand but iam left turning right how would it be (my fault,)
when i didn't give my address to  you all i ordered this the way i order
all things, even some Amazon purchases, and that's through (Shop) my
address I order with with them has[ not changed,]  if there was a problem
with that then it should have been addressed at  time of order but it
wasn't, /your system excepted  it /from shop as is, can you please explain
why would that be, at all my -fault-. Believe me sending out much money for
a hobby product, 1 product is not something I a person who only gets paid
once , on the 1, of each month, I tell you I don't do it frequently,  I
can't i don't have that kinda of money. But you know what do what yall feel
like doing with my money. Again not kool not kool, iam truly trying to
understand it. But i probably will never. Thanks again, I didn't )give yall
that address that it was taken to,  I say again (I didn't )give that
address it was taken to.  I wish that who ever was the smart one that
decided to deliver to that address without authorization would and should
retrieve it. Thanks again.

This is before order was shipped on the 7th of October, canceling order but
some one still  shipped it,  why I don't know,  but take a look.

 On Tue, Oct 7, 2025, 2:52 AM service@simsonn.com <service@simsonn.com> wrote: 
 
  

	 

 Hi terry smith,  

 

 We apologize for the inconvenience. We are currently on an 8-day holiday break. We will ship your order immediately from our US warehouse and send you a 3-pedal set as compensation. Thank you for your understanding. 

       

 

                           

                            On

                            ,  terry smith <tjsmithl64@gmail.com>  wrote:

I truly enjoyed the first set I ordered off of Amazon the plus set. Thought these set the ultimate would be a lot better,  guess i will never know. Five days have not even a tracking number, the listing says ship's in three days, I given 5. Thank you for the first ones, I really got use out of them. But I would love a refund for this oder, have a good day,  and thank you again.

Hi terry smith,    If you’ve adjusted the pedal’s mechanical structure, simply connect all three pedals, then reinsert the USB cable. Next, open the latest version of SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2, update the firmware, and click the “Offset” button on the interface. This will automatically reset the signal’s initial position (the white progress bar).  After that, perform a pedal calibration, and the blue progress bar should now move smoothly from 0% to 100% when pressing the pedal — this is required for the game to detect it properly. If you’re using iRacing, please also recalibrate the pedals manually within the game settings.  Don’t worry — if you encounter any other issues, we’ll make sure to help you get everything sorted out.

      描述:  Order # ssn2785 , ordered on September 30, 2025. (Express shipping) Never made it to the doyline post office, neither did it  make it to my P.O Box 192 71023.Today at 8:25pm MONDAY October 20, that's a lot of time,  not at all a happy customer.  You can not treat people like this. Your customer service, you must know,,,,,,,,,. Not cool not cool, but not cool. Thanks! For returning my money, for a product I never received. And my time of waiting not cool not cool.

      主题:   
      描述:  Again I have not received the order so can you all tell me how I would be able to review it,  not cool I tell you not good. No one not even you all likes your money played with.  I'm not saying this in a bad way but please send me my money,  I no longer have a need for your product. It has been 21 days I ordered expressed shipping. Thanks for your support.

合并来自工单5167  
      主题:   
      描述:  This is proof I purchased a set before, in June  look at the top of this order. I have no reason to lie but I do understand you'll position so please have some understanding of mine. When you all retrieve your product, please just send me my refund. This is unnecessary stress,  i only ordered them from all because Amazon had dates of delivery close to three weeks shipping out, but on yall's site it said 3 to seven days so that is the reason iam stressed now, no fault of yall's. But truly I would like a refund.

合并来自工单5176  
      主题: Order found  
      描述:  I shouldn't have had to go searching for my order, but I did, I don't have money to throw away,  I don't but you'll keeping 90dollars for nothing is not cool.  So I went to that address and the people were cool, that's a blessing I don't do people because of my PTSD, plus I needed to get back to my hobby. I do apologize. AND I thank you'll,  I really enjoyed the last set and hopefully will enjoy these to. And thanks.

Hi terry smith,    If you’ve adjusted the pedal’s mechanical structure, simply connect all three pedals, then reinsert the USB cable. Next, open the latest version of SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2, update the firmware, and click the “Offset” button on the interface. This will automatically reset the signal’s initial position (the white progress bar).  After that, perform a pedal calibration, and the blue progress bar should now move smoothly from 0% to 100% when pressing the pedal — this is required for the game to detect it properly. If you’re using iRacing, please also recalibrate the pedals manually within the game settings.  Don’t worry — if you encounter any other issues, we’ll make sure to help you get everything sorted out.

It worked,  thank you, I will most likely enjoy alot better than the other
ones. That was simple, thanks again for your help. And I appreciate you'll
patience.
